8_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj.body: Good evening. I'm having some trouble uploading an image to my user ID at ZeroMe. I tried uploading a square image, both with .png and .jpeg file extensions, at first with 800px² and then 450px². Here's an example of it: "http://ibb.co/jyYw0F". Sadly, no image gets displayed, it's currently blank. So, how does one go about uploading his user ID image?
I was using the Tor Browser nofish. But using Chromium for it did the trick. Thanks for the suggestion!
